title: FPS Drops when  playing against certain champs
body:
My FPS drops when I play against certain Champs, Most notably Miss Fortune's E.

This is very annoying and I've contacted Riot Support about this and they were unhelpful. Maybe the second time is the charm with them. 

If anyone else can help that would be great.

replies.body: Hmmmm that almost makes me think that maybe some of the champion files are actually damaged or corrupted. If you haven't yet, run a quick repair through the client options and let me know if that helps at all by testing it in a custom/practice game.
I reinstalled the client, and the issue is still present. Would I still have to repair the client?
